reviewText: If you have many of the other 'Main Event' DVD titles, then forget this one because you will already have it.  It simply recycles the incidents from the 80s and 90s that you have probably already seen a thousand times.  I was very disappointed, thinking that it may be an all new stand alone title, to find I had given them some more of my hard earned dosh for stuff they had already sold to me years ago.
